Text:
Work's Great Many Thanks 

Here are the istallation steps

1. Extract from ".rar" file by using Winrar

2. Install from "dvdnextcopy_next_tech_setup.exe"

3. Don't run the program, if running, then exit

4. Copy and Paste the PATCH into the installed folder

5. Run the PATCH and apply

6. OK 

DONE....!!!!
